thread.section_title: ArchitecturalDepot.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ArchitecturalDepot.com | architecturaldepot.com
thread.title: Donald Brzezinski

author: Donald Brzezinski
title: Donald Brzezinski
text:
They miss-ship, leave items out and then they don't respond!!!!
It's been 6 weeks and I have still not received everything in my order.
Every time I request they send the missing items, they tell me okay... "the checks in the mail" and then I hear nothing. I have done this 5 times to no avail!!!
Plenty of other competition out there. Try Udecor or wishihadthat or crownmolding.com.
Architectural depot is the worst!!!!
